general.error.guild_only_command.title: Guild only command!
general.error.guild_only_command.descrip: This command can only be run in a guild channel.
general.error.ambiguous_member.title: Ambiguous member argument!
general.error.ambiguous_member.descripti:
The name you have specified is too ambiguous (leads to more than 1 member)!
Please narrow down the specified name until it can uniquely identify a member of this guild.
general.error.insufficient_permissions.d:
I do not have sufficient permissions to carry out this action!
Please contact your server admins if you believe this is in error.
general.error.cannot_interact.title: Member is higher than me!
general.error.cannot_interact.descriptio: Cannot perform action on the given member, likely due to me being lower in the role hierarchy.
general.error.cannot_action_self.title: Cannot act against myself!
general.error.cannot_action_self.descrip: Cannot perform action against myself, as that would be counter-intuitive.
general.error.cannot_action_performer.de: You cannot perform this action against yourself.
moderation.insufficient_permissions.desc: The performer of this command has insufficient permissions to use this command.
moderation.cannot_interact.title: Cannot moderate Target.
moderation.cannot_interact.description: The performer of this command cannot moderate the target user, likely due to being lower in the role hierarchy.

moderation.unwarn.no_case_found.title: No warning found.
moderation.unwarn.no_case_found.descript: No warning with that case ID was found.
moderation.unwarn.cannot_unwarn_self.des: Performer cannot remove a warning from themselves.
moderation.warn.cannot_warn_mods.title: Cannot warn moderators.
moderation.warn.cannot_warn_mods.descrip: Moderators cannot issue warnings to other moderators.
moderation.warn.cannot_remove_higher_mod: Cannot remove warning issued by higher-ranked moderator.
The performer cannot remove this warning, as this was issued by a higher-ranking moderator.
moderation.note.max_amount_of_notes.desc: The performer has reached the maximum amount of notes for the target user.
moderation.note.no_note_found.title: No note found.
moderation.note.no_note_found.descriptio: No note with that note ID was found.

moderation.note.remove.author: Removed note.
